{"step_by_step_thinking": "The relevant information can be found in Document [7] (Title: Cremasteric Reflex -- Introduction -- Anatomy). According to this document, the innervation for the cremasteric reflex is provided by the sensory and motor fibers of the genitofemoral nerve that originates from the L1 and L2 spinal nerve nuclei.
